title: Define MVP compatibility matrix and acceptance tests for WinCairo limitations
goal: Create a comprehensive MVP requirements document that defines target sites, required web APIs, performance targets, and automated acceptance tests for each issue in WINCAIRO-LIMITATIONS.md

gates.cmd: python -c "content = open('docs/MVP-REQUIREMENTS.md', encoding='utf-8').read(); assert 'Target Sites' in content and 'Required Web APIs' in content and 'Performance Targets' in content, 'Missing required sections'"

steps: Analyze WINCAIRO-LIMITATIONS.md to identify all blockers and issues
Define target sites for MVP (GitHub, Wikipedia, news sites, OAuth flows)
Specify required Web APIs (cookies, localStorage, fetch, history, CORS)
Define measurable success criteria for each limitation
Document performance targets and stability requirements

rollback.strategy: Revert documentation changes if requirements are found to be incorrect or incomplete
